channel.title: Matrix | Need ;;kick Dupe Fix very badly
channel.description: I'm a mod on a server that's on the first page on rlocus... its in the top 30. At the moment the real owner currently doesnt give a fuck about it & is going to give it to someone else.. we had a player dupe about 500T w/ a mod a couple days ago... we're losing players constantly, & they dont want to do an ecoreset until this dupe is fixed, but the real owner doesnt want to even work on it... & the new to be owner doesnt have permission. if we could just find a fix to this ;;kick dupe glitch, I have a feeling I could persuade them to do an eco reset... Ive spent 2 and a half months of my life on this server already, really dont want it to shut down like this.. someone help?

item.title: Matrix | Need ;;kick Dupe Fix very badly
item.dc:creator: @Brandon_Codes Brandon Codes
item.description:
@Brandon_Codes wrote:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:4, topic:450555”][quote author=Brandon Codes link=topic=553443.msg4054802#msg4054802 date=1342834322]
I’m a mod on a server that’s on the first page on rlocus… its in the top 30. At the moment the real owner currently doesnt give a fuck about it & is going to give it to someone else… we had a player dupe about 500T w/ a mod a couple days ago… we’re losing players constantly, & they dont want to do an ecoreset until this dupe is fixed, but the real owner doesnt want to even work on it… & the new to be owner doesnt have permission. if we could just find a fix to this ;;kick dupe glitch, I have a feeling I could persuade them to do an eco reset… Ive spent 2 and a half months of my life on this server already, really dont want it to shut down like this… someone help?
[/quote]

Tell the owner to get their FAT ASS UP and do something. Otherwise, tell me his forum name(if they have one) so I can call him a leacher for the rest of his life.

PS: If you truly do care that much about a server and have the respect to, PM me. I’m looking for moderators for my project. We’re not public yet, but the server is online for a closed beta. I can use a mod like you.

But on topic; tell the owner to delete the kick command, if their arrogant self knows how to.[/quote]

Its really hard to contact him :\ he knows how to do shit, but he’s just basically done, probably just because there were SO many bugs w/ matrix’s first release you know… & yeah man, go ahead & add my skype I’ll pm you it. I’m not going to officially leave this server unless it has no chance anymore though… will probably find out in a few days.
Also, I should probably tell you that I’m only 14, but I’m not a squeaker or immature or some shit, you dont have to worry.

Read full topic
item.source: Matrix | Need ;;kick Dupe Fix very badly

item.title: Matrix | Need ;;kick Dupe Fix very badly
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Brandon Codes:

I’m a mod on a server that’s on the first page on rlocus… its in the top 30. At the moment the real owner currently doesnt give a fuck about it & is going to give it to someone else… we had a player dupe about 500T w/ a mod a couple days ago… we’re losing players constantly, & they dont want to do an ecoreset until this dupe is fixed, but the real owner doesnt want to even work on it… & the new to be owner doesnt have permission. if we could just find a fix to this ;;kick dupe glitch, I have a feeling I could persuade them to do an eco reset… Ive spent 2 and a half months of my life on this server already, really dont want it to shut down like this… someone help?

Tell the owner to get their FAT ASS UP and do something. Otherwise, tell me his forum name(if they have one) so I can call him a leacher for the rest of his life.

PS: If you truly do care that much about a server and have the respect to, PM me. I’m looking for moderators for my project. We’re not public yet, but the server is online for a closed beta. I can use a mod like you.

But on topic; tell the owner to delete the kick command, if their arrogant self knows how to.

Read full topic
